site_title: YouTube Play Button and Happy Face by Jeremy Shafer

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: 1000 Subscribers Celebration!!! What happens when you add a YouTube Play Button with a Happy Face? You get the Origami YouTube Play Button / Happy Face designed by Jeremy Shafer. This model is perfect for this occasion! I had the YouTube Play Button from Jo Nakashima at 200 Subscribers, and the Smiley Face Emoji from Jo Nakashima at 500 Subscribers. This model from Jeremy Shafer marinates the two together! As usual Thank-You for supporting my Channel and Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Jeremy Shafer
block_list.body: • YouTube Play Button and Happy Face by Jeremy Shafer
